column12:
u+1+2~D ⏵ HBS 1 ⏵ b+2,1~D ⏵ HBS d+1+2 ⏵ 
HBS df+2 T! ⏵ uf+2 ⏵ b+1

column2:
Hold moves charge up faster
ROLL stance is enhanced
Gains access to Electric Wind Bear Fist df+2+3
column7: Mostly useful in punishment situations and combos.
A safe mid heat engager. It can shift to HBS by holding down.

Running attack that shifts to HBS on block. Good way to
 start your stance pressure, but don't be too predictable
 as this move is quite linear.

column12:
(dash)  u+1+2~D ⏵ HBS 1 ⏵ b+2,1~D ⏵ HBS d+1+2 ⏵
HBS 1,2

column7: Power crush heat engager from stance.

Quick jab to check situations and start offense. 
 1,1,1 is a risky counterhit launcher to check opponents 
 overextending in their offense. 2,1 and it's extensions are 
 an alternative for poking.
column12:
HBS d+1+2 ⏵ HBS 1 ⏵ b+2,1~D ⏵ HBS d+1+2 ⏵ 
HBS df+2 T! ⏵ uf+2 ⏵ b+1

u+1+2~D ⏵ HBS 1 ⏵ b+2,1~D ⏵ HBS d+1+2 ⏵ 
HBS df+2 T! ⏵ uf+2 ⏵ b+1

column7:
Low poke to harass opponents that stand block. You can 
 also use FC d+1 as it's safe on block and plus on hit.
column12:
ws+1,2 (short hold) T! ⏵ b+2,1,(3+4) ⏵ HBS d+1+2 ⏵ 
HBS 1,2

column7:
A high long range counterhit launcher. Use this to control 
 the mid range.

The bear hellsweep is a high crushing counterhit launcher 
 very punishable on block, but a good way to start offense.

column12:
(dash)  u+1+2~D ⏵ HBS 1 ⏵ b+2,1~D ⏵ HBS d+1+2 ⏵
HBS 1,2

column7:
A mid attack for pressure. Hold down or press 3+4 to shift 
 to HBS and start your stance pressure.

Another mid attack to start yuor stance pressure, but this 
 option is a lot slower. Use it in okizeme situations to avoid 
 being interrupted out of it.
Homing mid that launches on counterhit.
column12:
u+1+2~D ⏵ HBS 1 ⏵ b+2,1~D ⏵ HBS d+1+2 ⏵ 
HBS df+2 T! ⏵ uf+2 ⏵ b+1

column7: Make sure to learn some of your stance options.

column12: b+3+4 T! ⏵ df+1,2,1+2 (delay last hit) ⏵ d+1+2

After tornado, you can use uf+2 (or HBS df+1) and follow
with heat burst to extend the combo.

Use df+2,1 for long wall carry distances and 1,2 or uf+2
for shorter carry.
Use 1+2 or d+1+2 to break walls and b+1 to floor break.
